In this important video we curate recent #news to give you the big picture: 19 millionth Bitcoin mined, only 2mil to go! (Bitcoin Miami anyone?) ETH token issuance drops after the “merge”... price set to skyrocket? BNY Mellon + Circle deal. Inflows coming back to crypto, DeFi sector TVL up.
